data.name: XCellRangeMovement
desc: provides methods for moving ranges of cells in a sheet.

methods.name: copyRange
desc: copies a cell range to another position in the document.
The source cell range keeps unchanged.

methods.name: insertCells
desc: inserts cells, moving other cells down or right.
Non-empty cells cannot be moved off the sheet.

methods.name: moveRange
desc: moves a cell range to another position in the document.
After copying the contents of the cell range, all cells will be cleared.

methods.name: removeRange
desc: deletes cells, moving other cells up or left.
